dialogues.text: There isn’t anyone else, Hermione! Everyone from the Order is gone!

dialogues.speaker: GINNY
dialogues.text: Anything we can do to help?

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: No, there isn’t!  147. Ginny crosses her arms, looking slightly hurt.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Yes, they can, Harry.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: How?

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Before we do anything, we need to establish that Sirius really isn’t at Headquarters. Which means we’1l need to break into Umbridge’s office. She smiles, and glances at Fred and George.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: For that, we’ll need a really good distraction. Fred and George grin.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Right you are, Hermione. Think we can whip something up, George?

dialogues.speaker: GEORGE
dialogues.text: Might be able to.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Just give us a few seconds.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Mind you, it’s got to be really good!

dialogues.speaker: GEORGE
dialogues.text: Not to worry, Hermione. We’ve got something that will outdue everything else we’ve done here combined.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: It’s been too quiet around here anyway.

dialogues.speaker: GEORGE
dialogues.text: Time we did some real damage to this place. They lean close to each other and begin whispering togeth in excited voices.  148.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: We’ll also need to keep everyone away from her office. Ginny brightens.

dialogues.speaker: GINNY
dialogues.text: We can do that! Me and Luna’1l guard the hallway. Harry smiles at them.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: We'll probably only manage five minutes or so.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: That’s all we'll need. Fred and George straighten.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Right. You’ve got ten minutes to get to Umbridge’s office. And whatever you do, stay away from the Astronomy Tower for the next couple of hours.

dialogues.speaker: GEORGE
dialogues.text: Unless they spread, in which case, I'd get out of the castle for a while. They leave. Hermione turns to Harry.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Break out your Invisibility Cloak, Harry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ginny and Luna have taken up positions outside Umbridge’s office at the ends of the hall on either side. Suddenly, there is a BANG like a CANON has gone off, and whole castle shakes. Dust drifts from the ceiling. Umbridge stumbles from her office, looking up at the ceil Filch tears around the corner.  149.

dialogues.speaker: FILCH
dialogues.text: Professor! It’s those Weasley twins! They’ve set something off in the Astronomy Tower! Umbridge smiles twistedly.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Ready to try out the old punishments again?

dialogues.speaker: FILCH
dialogues.text: (grinning) They’ve had this coming for a long time! They depart around the corner. A second later, the door t Umbridge’s office swings open and closed. INT. UMBRIDGE’S OFFICE - DAY Harry and Hermione drop the Invisibility cloak. Harry rac to the fireplace, snatching up a handful of FLOO POWDER. tosses it into the fire.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Grimmauld Place! The fire turns bright green. Harry sticks his head into t fire.

dialogues.speaker: INT. GRIMMAULD PLACE
dialogues.text: Harry’s head appears in the kitchen. It is empty.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Sirius! Are you here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Umbridge and Filch race around the corner and stop dead. There is a DRAGON made of FIREWORKS sweeping through the hallway. Umbridge draws her wand and tries to stop it. The spell EXPLODES harmless against the firework dragon, and it spl into a dozen dragons which fly down different corridors. They break into a run after the closest one and vanish do hallway.  150. Fred and George step out from behind a statue, laughing.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: That was worth it! Filch steps back around the corner, grinning evilly.

dialogues.speaker: FILCH
dialogues.text: I’ve got you now! Fred and George break into a run. Filch follows, along wi Umbridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fred and George run full out down this hallway. Draco and Inquisitional Squad comes around the corner ahead. Fred a George peel around, returning the way they had come, but Filch and Umbridge block that way off. The close in on the Weasley twins. Fred nods at George. George pulls a nasty-looking DEVICE from his pocket and d it on the floor. It explodes in a flash of LIGHT. Everyone covers their ey When it clears, there is a huge SWAMP in the middle of th hall and the Weasleys are standing well beyond Umbridge a the Squad.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Thank you for playing, one and all.

dialogues.speaker: GEORGE
dialogues.text: And now, we've got to go! They turn and vanish down another hallway.

dialogues.speaker: INT. GRIMMAULD PLACE
dialogues.text: Harry continues to shout.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Sirius! Lupin? Hello?

dialogues.speaker: KREACHER
dialogues.text: What’s this? The Potter boy in the fire... Kreacher comes into view of the fireplace.  151.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Kreacher, where’s Sirius?

dialogues.speaker: KREACHER
dialogues.text: Master went out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fred and George skid to a stop in the entry hall near the great doors leading outside. From every direction, Inquisitional Squad members close i them. Behind them, students and teachers pour into the entry ha Beaming, and not appearing the least bit afraid, Fred and George wave to people in the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: So, turning a hallway into a swamp is funny, is it?

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Fairly amusing, yeah.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Well, now you’re going to learn what happens to wrongdoers in my school. Filch pulls out a long evil-looking BLACK WHIP, smiling.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: This was never your school! Hogwarts is Dumbledore’s school! There is a loud cheer from the students filling the hall. Umbridge looks around, livid with rage.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Well, now you’re going to get your punishments right here, in front of the whole school! Fred snorts.

dialogues.speaker: GEORGE
dialogues.text: You know, I don’t think we are.  152.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: George, I think we’ve outgrown full- time education. Wouldn’t you agree?

dialogues.speaker: GEORGE
dialogues.text: Completely, Fred.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Time to enter the real world?

dialogues.speaker: GEORGE
dialogues.text: Definitely. Together they raise their wands.

dialogues.speaker: FRED AND GEORGE
dialogues.text: Accio brooms! ITN. UMBRIDGE’S OFFICE - DAY Hermione shrieks as Fred and George’s brooms rip themselv from the wall and fly out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The brooms speed to Fred and George. They leap on them. Draco and some others from the Inquisitional Squad charge them. Fred and George kick off from the ground and into the air Fred glares at Umbridge.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: We won’t be seeing you.

dialogues.speaker: GEORGE
dialogues.text: Yeah, don’t bother writing. They wave their wands and the great doors open, revealing BEAUTIFUL SUNSET over the Forbidden Forest.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Be sure to visit us at our new premises on Diagon Alley! And they dive on their brooms, sailing out the doors and the beautiful sunset.  153.

dialogues.speaker: INT. GRIMMAULD PLACE
dialogues.text: Harry glares at Kreacher.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: You know where he is, don’t you?

dialogues.speaker: KREACHER
dialogues.text: Master does not tell Kreacher where he goes.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: But you know. Kreacher grins horribly.

dialogues.speaker: KREACHER
dialogues.text: Master will never return from the Department of Mysteries! Harry gapes. Kreacher cackles in his nasty way, and scamp from the room.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: (v.o.) Harry! A stubby hand appears in the fire over Harry’s head and g his hair, yanking him back. Both head and hand vanish fro the fireplace. INT. UMBRIDGE’S OFFICE - DAY Umbridge throws Harry to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: You think you could simply walk into my office without me knowing about it? Foolish boy! Harry looks around the room. Malfoy leans against a windowsill. Hermione, Ginny, Luna, Ron, and Neville are u guard by the Inquisitional Squad, their wands piled on th floor. Umbridege draws her wand and waves it at Harry.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Accio wand! Harry’s wand flips from his pocket to Umbridge’s hand.  154.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Who were you trying to contact?

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: It’s none of your business.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Draco, would you fetch Professor Snape, please? Draco leaves. Umbridge smiles sickeningly at Harry.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Very well, Potter. I have been patient enough with you. Draco returns with Snape.

dialogues.speaker: SNAPE
dialogues.text: You wished to see me?

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: I have just caught Potter trying to communicate with someone in my fire. I need some Veritaserum. Truth syrum.

dialogues.speaker: SNAPE
dialogues.text: Well, it appears that I cannot help you. I have none. He turns to leave. Harry looks at him desperately.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: He’s got Padfoot at the place it’s hidden!

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: What? What does that mean?

dialogues.speaker: SNAPE
dialogues.text: Potter, if I want nonsense shouted at me, I shall inform you. He sweeps from the office. Umbridge is enraged.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: We've played nicely, Potter. You leave me no choice! She draws her wand, moving menacingly at Harry.  155.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: You could have saved me a lot of trouble if those Dementors I sent to your house had finished you off!

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: You sent the Dementors?

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Of course I did! Someone had to act! She points her wand at Harry’s chest.

dialogues.speaker: CRUCIO
dialogues.text: Harry SCREAMS as the curse washes over him. He slumps to ground, shaking wildly.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: No! Please, stop! Umbridge looks pleased and turns to Hermione.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Well, well.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Hermione, no!

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: We have to tell her, Harry...

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I would rather die!

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Shut up, Potter! Now talk, you silly girl! Who were you talking to?

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: We were trying to find Professor Dumbledore. We had to tell him...

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Tell him?

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: That it’s ready. The weapon.  156. Umbridge’s eyes are shining with eagerness. She smiles at Hermione.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: You and Mr. Potter will take me to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Umbridge, Harry, and Hermione move through the forest.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Much further, is it?

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Oh, yes. It’s very well hidden. They wander around for a while in silence. An ARROW lands the ground next to them. They stop, as about fifty Centau emerge once again from the underbrush.

dialogues.speaker: MAGORIAN
dialogues.text: What are you doing in our forest?

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Your forest? This forest belongs to the Ministry of Magic! The centaurs move closer.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Stay back, you beasts! There are HOWLS of rage from the ranks of Centaurs. Many and draw their bows.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: You cannot attack me! Any attack on a wizard by a half-breed--

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Don’t call them that! Magorian ROARS in anger.

dialogues.speaker: MAGORIAN
dialogues.text: You dare to insult us? Umbridge points her wand at him, though it is shaking in hands.  157.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Come no closer! Magorian rears up on his hind-legs and beats his chest.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Incarcerus! Ropes fly from her wand and wrap themselves around Magori The Centaurs charge Umbridge. Harry grabs Hermione and they leap behind a tree. They ca still here Umbridge scream, as the centaurs surround her.

dialogues.speaker: UMBRIDGE
dialogues.text: Ingrates! Animals! Filthy half- bloods! There is BLAST like a GUNSHOT and Umbridge screams again. Harry and Hermione are grabbed by two Centaurs.

dialogues.speaker: CENTAUR
dialogues.text: What of these two?

dialogues.speaker: CENTAUR
dialogues.text: They have been here with Hagrid. They have heard the warnings and disobeyed. They must suffer the consequences! Several trees to their left are torn from the ground and tossed aside like twigs. There stands Grawp. The centaurs stop dead in their tracks. Grawp ROARS. INT. UMBRIDGE’S OFFICE - DAY Draco paces in front of Ron, Ginny, Luna, and Neville, smiling.

dialogues.speaker: DRACO
dialogues.text: God, I can’t wait until all you Weasleys have been expelled. Your stench has been fouling this castle for too long. Ron glares at him.

dialogues.speaker: RON
dialogues.text: Shut up, Malfoy!  158. Draco smiles and punches Ron in the gut. He doubles over.

dialogues.speaker: DRACO
dialogues.text: That’s for speaking to me. You know, you Weasleys are just as bad as Mudbloods! Ron has fallen near the pile of wands on the floor. Draco ignores him and sneers at Ginny.

dialogues.speaker: DRACO
dialogues.text: You know, Weasley, it’s really too bad Potter saved you from the Chamber of Secrets. Ginny struggles against Crabbe, who is restraining her. Ron snatches up his wand.

dialogues.speaker: RON
dialogues.text: Stupify! Crabbe falls over. Ginny leaps at Draco, who is knocked t the ground. Luna calmly kicks her restrainer in the shins Neville slips out of the strangle-hold he’d been in and snatches up his wand. Goyle waves his wand, but Neville is faster.

dialogues.speaker: NEVILLE
dialogues.text: Expelliarmus! THe wand flies away. Ginny rolls away from Draco, scoopin her wand. She waves it at him, and he’s blasted backward the wall. He slumps to the floor. They exit the office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is silence as they all stare at Grawp.

dialogues.speaker: GRAWP
dialogues.text: Haggar! There is another silence. Grawp sees Harry and Hermione.

dialogues.speaker: GRAWP
dialogues.text: Hermy! Where Haggar? The centaurs raise their bows to point at the giant.  159.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Grawp, help us! Grawp ROARS again and BEATS his CHEST.

dialogues.speaker: GRAWP
dialogues.text: Grawp save Hermy! He reaches out for them. The centaurs LOOSE their ARROWS. They pepper Grawp across the face and chest. He roars in AGONY and begins stomping on the ground, as if trying to squash the centaurs, who scatter. Harry grabs Hermione’s hand and drags her away from the fight. As they depart, they hear Grawp one last time.

dialogues.speaker: GRAWP WANT HAGGAR
dialogues.text: Harry and Hermione reach the edge of the forest. They sto catch their breath.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Great plan, Hermione.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: I thought it worked out rather nicely.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: What are we supposed to do now?

dialogues.speaker: RON
dialogues.text: That’s just what we were wondering. Ron, Ginny, Luna, and Neville appear from around Hagrid’s hut. Harry and Hermione look surprised.

dialogues.speaker: RON
dialogues.text: So, how do we get to the Ministry? He tosses Harry and Hermione their wands.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: I’d imagine we should fly.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: We’ve got no brooms.  160.

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: There are other ways to fly. She nods in the direction of the forest.

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: I mean, they can fly, and they're very good at finding places you need to go. Harry turns around and sees three THESTRALS watching them

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: What are those?

dialogues.speaker: RON
dialogues.text: What are what? He looks right at them and doesn’t see them.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: There’s nothing there, Harry.

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: Yes, there is. They’re Thestrals. You can’t see them unless you’ve seen someone die. Neville is quiet. Finally, he looks up.

dialogues.speaker: NEVILLE
dialogues.text: I can see them too. Harry claps his hands.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: All right, then. Get on one, and we'll be off.

dialogues.speaker: RON
dialogues.text: And what about those of us who can't see them? Luna comes over to them.

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: I’1l show you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun has set behind the mountains in the distance.  161. Harry and Ginny, Ron and Hermione, and Luna and Neville a each paired on one Thestral as they fly over the BRITISH LANDSCAPE towarsd LONDON. The Thestrals dive. Hermione gives a SHRIEK of surprise a they swoop down closer to the lights of London.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They SOAR between buildings and finally set down in front a TELEPHONE BOOTH. Ron jumps off of the thestral shakily.

dialogues.speaker: RON
dialogues.text: Never again...

dialogues.speaker: GINNY
dialogues.text: What now, Harry? Harry leads the way to the telephone booth. He opens the and steps in. The rest cram inside with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lift grinds to a halt and the doors swing open. Harry the others step out to the receptionist area with the GOL FOUNTAIN. The place is deathly quiet and completely deserted. They fan out, wands at the ready. Harry waits a moment.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: All right, come on. They head past the fountain and up the steps into the Ministry of Magic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This larger lift CLINKS downward slowly. Finally, it grin to a halt.

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE VOICE
dialogues.text: Department of Mysteries. The doors open and Harry leads the others out. This department too is abandoned.  162.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Where is everyone?

dialogues.speaker: GINNY
dialogues.text: The Ministry closed a half-hour ago. I expect they all went home. Harry nods grimly.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: That’s how Voldemort got in unnoticed. They walk until they reach the hallway from Harry’s dream

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: This is it. Come on. They make their way down the long hall until they reach t door at the end of the hall. Only it does not glow. Harry tries the handle. It swings open.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Stay close. He steps into the next room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This room is large and circular. It is filled with identi doors all the way around. It is illuminated by BLUE-FLAME CANDLES. After Neville enters the room, the door swings shut with ECHOING BANG.

dialogues.speaker: GINNY
dialogues.text: Now where? Harry looks around, confused.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I don’t understand. In my dream, the doors weren’t identical.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Well, let’s try a few. Harry nods.  163.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Yeah. I’‘1ll know the way when I see it. He goes to the first door he sees and opens the door. He steps inside. The others follow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry opens the door and enters. The rest follow. The room is like an upside-down ZIGGURAT, with huge steps leading to the base of the pit. On the lowest level rests dark, grey VEIL that flutters as if there were a breeze. Soft whispers fill the room.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Who’s there? He clambers down to the Veil and stares hard at it. The whispers INTENSIFY. Harry looks around the room.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Sirius?

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: There’s no one here, Harry. This isn’t the right room.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Does anyone else hear that?

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: I do. It’s coming from the Veil. They look at it. It flutters menacingly though there is n wind. Harry moves closer to it, slowly.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: (quietly) Harry... His eyes are locked on the veil. He walks closer.

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: There are people in there!  164.

dialogues.speaker: RON
dialogues.text: What do you mean, people?

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Harry, I think we should leave. Harry reaches out his hand towards the veil. Hermione comes up behind Harry and grabs his arm. He trie pull away from her, eyes still locked on the veil. The whispers have intensified into HARSH MOANS as Harry i only feet away from the veil.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Harry, we’re here for Sirius, remember? Harry stops. He blinks and drops his hand.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Sirius...yeah... She gently leads him away from the Veil. The moans have returned to whispers once again, muttering angrily as the depart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They return to the Room of Doors. Hermione draws a FLAMIN over the door they just closed. Harry moves to the next one. It is locked. He raises his wand.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Alohomora! It remains closed.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Whatever’s in there, the Ministry sure doesn’t want anyone getting to it. He moves to the next door and opens it, stepping inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They enter the CLOCK ROOM. Every surface is covered in clocks.  165.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: This is it! Come on! They move through the clocks. Harry leads them back to the end of the room, where anoth door lies.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: This is it. This is where Sirius is! He opens the door and charges through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry and the others spill into the HALL OF PROPHESY and stop. Harry glances around. They grip their wands tightly The room is GIGANTIC, being over fifty feet high and incredibly lond. There are rows and rows of shelves. On every shelf are dozens of dusty GOLDEN ORBS. The room is LIT by more BLUE-FLAMED CANDLES.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: He’s in here somewhere. He leads them down the center isle, peering down each row turns down one row, leading them to the end. This end ope out into another wide isle. The row is empty. He looks around in confusion.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: I don’t think Sirius is here. Ron stares at one of the orbs.

dialogues.speaker: RON
dialogues.text: Harry, have you seen this? Harry looks over his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: RON
dialogues.text: Er...it’s got your name on it. Sure enough, there was a golden orb resting on the shelf the label “S.P.T. to A.P.W.B.D.: The Dark Lord and (?) Ha Potter.”  166. Harry reaches out for it.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: What’s my name doing here?

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Don’t touch it, Harry! Harry glares at her.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Why not?

dialogues.speaker: NEVILLE
dialogues.text: Yeah, Harry, don’t. He looks at Neville, who is very pale.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: It’s got my name on it! He takes it off the shelf and looks at it.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: I warned you before that one day you would come to a sticky end, Potter. LUCIUS MALFOY emerges from the shadows, cloaked all in bl Two dozen other Death Eaters emerge around him. Harry and the others are surrounded and outnumbered.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Where’s Sirius? Lucius, and several other death eaters laugh.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: We don’t have him, if that’s what you mean. Harry is stunned.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: You never did, did you? It was all just a trick.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: The Dark Lord knows your weakness for heroics, Potter. All it took was a little nudge to get you here.  167. Lucius reaches out his hand, palm up.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: Now give me that prophesy.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: What prophesy? Lucius points at the Golden orb.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: That prophesy. Now hand it over or we'll have to use wands on you. Harry raises his wand at the same time that Ginny, Nevill Hermione, Ron, and Luna raised theirs.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Go ahead. Lucius regards him coldly.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: Very brave of you, Potter. Or are you foolish?

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Come and find out! Lucius doesn’t move.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: Really, Potter. You expect to defeat all of us with your little school friends? Now hand it over, and they won’t have to die here. One of the Death Eaters moves forward, throwing back her hood. It is BELLATRIX LESTRANGE.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: I haven’t escaped from Azkaban for this! She raises her wand. Lucius forces her arm down.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: No! If the prophesy is smashed-- He stops and turns back to Harry. But Bellatrix turns to several other Death Eaters.  168.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: Take the youngest girl. We’ll see how committed Potter is as we torture her. Ron, Hermione, Luna, and Neville close in around Ginny. H steps in front of Ginny, wand out and aimed at Bellatrix’ chest. He holds the prophesy in his other hand.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: You even try to take her and I’‘11 smash this thing. He tosses the prophesy casually into the air and catches again. Lucius starts in horror.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: So, what kind of prophesy are we talking about here?

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: Surely you jest, Potter?

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Not really. How come Voldemort wants it?

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: You dare to speak the Dark Lord's name?

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Who, Voldemort? Oh, yeah, I dare. Voldemort, voldemort, Voldemort--

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: Silence! How dare you utter that name from your half-blood mouth!

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Hey, did you know Voldemort’s a half-blood too? Bella raises her wand to strike, but Malfoy stops her aga

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: Control yourself, Bellatrix!

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: What’s so special about this prophesy anyway? Bella shrieks with laughter.  169.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: You mean Dumbledore never told you the reason you bear that scar was hidden here? Harry looks as if slapped, he is so surprised.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: What? Lucius and the Death Eaters laugh.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: (whispering) When I give the signal, blast the shelves... Hermione and Ron nod grimly.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: So that’s what took you so long. We wondered.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: But why did he need me to take it?

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: Only a person for whom the prophesy was made can remove it from its self, Potter, and the Dark Lord certainly couldn’t get it himself. Harry is angry.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: So he used me to do his dirty work, did he?

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: Precisely, Potter.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Now! No less than six wands fire into the shelves at once. The Death Eaters cover their faces as DEBRIS covers them.

dialogues.speaker: RUN
dialogues.text: Dust fills the air. Entire shelves fall CRASHING to the ground, raining glass shards and golden orbs. The student break and run for the door.  170. Malfoy grabs Harry by the shoulder. Hermione waves her wa at him.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Stupify! Malfoy is blasted backward. Harry and Hermione run after others. Spells explode around them.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: Stop them! Harry is the last through the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hermione slams the door shut and points her wand at it.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Colloportus! The door seals itself. Harry looks around. Only Hermione and Neville are still w him.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Where'd the rest go? Hermione looks around.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Harry, they went the wrong way! They run after Ron, Ginny, and Luna. Just then, the door blasts off its hinges. Harry, Hermione, and Neville dive underneath several desk Death Eaters enter the room, slowly moving between the cl and desks.

dialogues.speaker: DEATH EATER
dialogues.text: They might have gone on to the hall.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: Check under the desks. Harry leaps out from under his desk.  171.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Stupify! A JET of RED LIGHT hits one of the Death Eaters in the ch He is knocked backward into the wall. Hermione jumps from under her desk and runs for the exit. Bellatrix sees her and raises her wand.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: Avada-- Neville emerges from beneath his desk.

dialogues.speaker: NEVILLE
dialogues.text: Expelliarmus! Bella’s wand flies from her fingers. Harry finishes her o

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Stupify! Bellatrix is STRUCK with the same red light and falls to ground. There is a YELL from the next room.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Ron! Two Death Eaters enter the room.

dialogues.speaker: DEATH EATER
dialogues.text: Impedimenta! The spell blasts Harry, Hermione, and Neville backward. Neville flies over a desk. Hermione strikes a bookshelf a is nearly buried under the falling books, and Harry strik the wall.

dialogues.speaker: DEATH EATER
dialogues.text: We’ve got him!

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Silenco! Stupify! The death eater falls silent, and then to the ground. Harry staggers to his feet, dazed.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Pretificus Totalus!  172. The second Death Eater falls to the ground and cannot mov The mute Death Eater attacks Hermione, making a slashing movement with his wand. Purple flame BLASTS from the wand and slashes Hermione ac the chest. Her eyes go wide and she falls to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: NEVILLE
dialogues.text: Stupify! The death eater falls over.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Hermione! He runs to her. She appears to be sleeping.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Please don’t be dead, please don’t be dead... He shakes her.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Hermione, wake up... Neville runs over.

dialogues.speaker: NEVILLE
dialogues.text: What’s they do to her? Harry shakes his head. Neville feels her wrist.

dialogues.speaker: NEVILLE
dialogues.text: She’s alive, Harry. There’s a pulse. Harry sighs in relief.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Can we carry her?

dialogues.speaker: NEVILLE
dialogues.text: I’ll do it. You’re better at fighting. He hoists Hermione up on his back. They move on to the room. next  173.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry, and Neville, still carrying Hermione, re-emerge in the circular room of doors. Hermione’s X’s have fades fro the walls.

dialogues.speaker: NEVILLE
dialogues.text: Where do we go?

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I don’t know... A door opens and Luna and Ginny emerge, helping Ron walk between them.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: What happened.

dialogues.speaker: GINNY
dialogues.text: I think my ankle’s broken. And somebody hit Ron with a weird spell... Ron laughs strangely.

dialogues.speaker: RON
dialogues.text: Hiyya, Harry. (he giggles) You look funny.... He laughs again. Ginny’s legs give way, and both she and Ron fall to the ground. Harry is at Ginny’s side, looking concerned. She is breat very hard.

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: They hit her with something too. Harry straightens.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: We need to get out of here. Luna, can you help Ginny? Luna moves to her side. Another door opens, and five death eaters emerge.  174.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: There they are! Stunning spells rain all around them. The wounded group h for the nearest door. Luna is blasted off her feet by a stunning spell. She and Ginny TUMBLE to the floor. Harry has no choice but to kee running. The next stunning spell hits Neville in the back. He fall the ground, Hermione rolling away from him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry and Ron stagger into the Room of the Veil. Just as enter, Ron is hit and falls. Harry slips and tumbles down the bottom of the chamber. He comes to rest by the DAIS o the Veil. Doors all around him burst open and Death Eaters enter, climbing down to surround him--from a safe distance. Harry staggers up onto the dais, his wand held weakly in hand. Blood trickles out of his mouth and down his chin. Malfoy shoves his way towards Harry.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: Your race is run, Potter. Hand it over. Harry glances around frantically.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Let my friends go and I will. Bellatrix and several other Death Eaters drag his friends into the chamber.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: You are not in a position to negotiate. Neville struggles against the Death Eater holding him.

dialogues.speaker: NEVILLE
dialogues.text: Don’t do it, Harry! Don’t!

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Stop, Neville!  175. Bellatrix looks at Neville.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: Neville? Neville Longbottom? She laughs in glee.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: My dear boy, I paid your parents a visit a long time ago. We had such a time!

dialogues.speaker: NEVILLE
dialogues.text: You put them in St. Mungos! Bellatrix beams at him.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: So, Potter. Give us the Prophesy or I’1l see how long it takes to crack Longbottom like his parents. Harry is desperate.

dialogues.speaker: NEVILLE
dialogues.text: Don’t give it to them! Bellatrix points her wand at him.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: Crucio! Neville HOWLS in PAIN, curling up in a ball and SCREAMING the top of his lungs. The doors at the top of the chamber EXPLODE off their hin Everything stops as Lupin, Sirius, Moody, Tonks, and Kingsley. They BLAST spells at the Death Eaters. Malfoy moves to attack, but Tonks disarms him. Harry leaps off of the DAIS, landing next to Neville.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Are you all right?

dialogues.speaker: NEVILLE
dialogues.text: Yeah... He and Harry begin making their way away from the fightin man grabs Harry from behind, his large, sweaty arm around Harry's throat.  176.

dialogues.speaker: DEATH EATER
dialogues.text: Give me the prophesy! Neville leaps upon his back and hits him in the face. Har elbows him in the ribs. The man falls away. As he falls, strikes Harry’s hand by accident. The prophesy flies from his hand. Malfoy sees it. He raises his wand. Sirius leaps into him Both men fall the rest of the way to the lowest level of room, landing hard. The prophesy bounces off of a step, flips down to the nex level and shatters against the stone. A GHOSTLY version of Professor Trelawney appears over the shattered golden orb, speaks something which cannot be he over the fight, and dissolves away. Harry and Neville seem frozen, staring at the broken piec of the orb. Sirius gets to his feet and sprints to Harry and Neville.

dialogues.speaker: SIRIUS
dialogues.text: Get out of here, you two! He points at one of the doors.

dialogues.speaker: SIRIUS
dialogues.text: That will take you back out of the Department of Mysteries. Sirius makes to go back to the fight. Harry grabs his han

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: You come with us! Sirius shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: SIRIUS
dialogues.text: You’re the important one, now, Harry. I have to help the Order. Slowly, Harry lets go of Sirius’s robe sleeve. He looks i his Godfather’s eyes.

dialogues.speaker: SIRIUS
dialogues.text: I‘ll always be here for you, Harry. Now go!  177. He pushes Harry away from him towards the door. A spell rockets past Sirius’s head. Bellatrix leaps down in front of Sirius. She smiles. Siri grins.

dialogues.speaker: SIRIUS
dialogues.text: Hello, cousin! He fires a spell at her. She dodges, leaping down to the on which the Veil sits. Sirius leaps after. Their wands clash, blinding lights exploding from the tips. Harry and Neville climb towards the door.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: Potter! They whirl around to find Lucius only feet away, holding wand out at them.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: We may have lost the prophesy, but I can still deliver you to the Dark Lord! He waves his wand.

dialogues.speaker: LUCIUS
dialogues.text: Stupify! Harry raises his own.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Protego! Malfoy’s spell bounces away from Harry. The door opens and Dumbledore, EYES BLAZING, enters, his at the ready.

dialogues.speaker: NEVILLE
dialogues.text: It’s Dumbledore! Malfoy attempts to run, but Dumbledore snaps his wand out and Malfoy is knocked over and dragged back. Dumbledore moves past Harry and Neville, descending into appears to be a war zone. He reaches the fight before the Death Eaters even know he there.  178. Dumbledore blasts two of them across the room before the notice. They break for the exits, but members of the Orde are already there, stunning them. Bellatrix fires a stunning spell. Sirius ducks under it, laughing.

dialogues.speaker: SIRIUS
dialogues.text: Is that the best you’ve got, cousin? He doesn’t even see it coming. He’s barely finished his sentence when the second spell strikes him in the chest. He is lifted up into the air, a look of shock upon his fa Time seems to slow for Harry as he watches Sirius’s desce And then Sirius falls into the Veil, his body simply fall behind it. He does not reappear on the other side. Harry sprints for his Godfather, but he seems to move in motion.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: (screaming) Sirius! He leaps down towards the Veil, abandoning everything. Te are streaming down his face. His wand drifts from his gra and clatters behind him. He leaps to the lowest level and charges up to the DAIS. Lupin reaches out and grabs him, holding him fast.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: (screaming) Let me go! He hits at Lupin, trying to break away from him.

dialogues.speaker: LUPIN
dialogues.text: Harry! HARRY!...he’s gone...there’s nothing you can do... Harry hits him across the face, still struggling wildly.

dialogues.speaker: LIAR
dialogues.text: Things seem to slow down. All sound dies away for Harry. Spells flash and explode all around, bathing the room in strange colors, mixing with the light of the blue candles  179. But Harry’s legs simply give out and he slumps against Lu who is also weeping. Harry clenches and unclenches his fists in agony, beating them weakly against Lupin’s chest.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: No...no...no.... Lupin bodily picks Harry up, still weeping, and carries h away from the Dais. He lets go of Harry and turns to help Neville. Harry stan dumbfounded beside him, still staring at the Veil. Kingsley leaps up to duel with Bellatrix, but she blasts aside. Dumbledore turns and attempts to stop her, but she deflec the spell and leaps towards the door. Harry watches her, and there is COLD FURY in his eyes. Harry sprints after her. Lupin turns to see him leaping u after Bellatrix.

dialogues.speaker: LUPIN
dialogues.text: Harry, no! He flies through the door after her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry enters just to see Bellatrix escape through a doorw He charges after her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry sprints down the steps leading out to the GOLDEN FOUNTAIN and the Telephone Lift. Bellatrix is nearly to i

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: You can’t stop me, Potter!

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I’LL KILL YOu!! He brandishes his wand.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Stupify!  180. Bellatrix turns and deflects it. She fires back at him. H dives behind the fountain. There is silence. Then, the slow footfalls of Bellatrix.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: Come out, come out, Potter... Harry grows more angry by the second.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: Well, well, have you come to avenge your dear Godfather? Harry leaps out from behind the fountain.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Crucio! He hits her squarely in the chest. She SHRIEKS in pain an falls to the ground, but she rolls away from him to her f almost immediately.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: Crucio! Harry leaps behind the statue of the Centaur. Bellatrix’s spell blasts the Centaur’s head off. It clangs away into darkness.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: Never used an Unforgivable Curse before, have you, Potter? You have to mean it, you have to want to cause the pain in your very soul... She tries to outflank him, but he moves behind another statue.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: Give me the prophesy!

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Can’t. It got smashed by accident!

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: You lie! Harry laughs.  181.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: How’s Voldemort going to like that? You’ve failed him, and he’s not very forgiving, is he? Bellatrix lets out a shriek of horror.

dialogues.speaker: BELLATRIX
dialogues.text: Forgive me, Master! I tried, I-- Harry laughs again.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: He can’t hear you from here, you know!

dialogues.speaker: VOLDEMORT
dialogues.text: Can’t I, Potter? Voldemort has appeared in the middle of the hall, his wan pointed at Harry.

dialogues.speaker: VOLDEMORT
dialogues.text: So, you smashed my prophesy... Harry doesn’t move, frozen into stillness by the horror. Voldemort sneers.

dialogues.speaker: VOLDEMORT
dialogues.text: I grow tired of you continually thwarting my plans, Harry Potter! He snaps his wand down.

dialogues.speaker: VOLDEMORT
dialogues.text: Avada Kadavra! Green light EXPLODES from his wand. Harry flinches, but t statue of the GOLDEN WIZARD leaps down from the fountain takes the blast full in the chest. It explodes in a thous shards of molten metal. Voldemort whirls. Dumbledore stands at the doorway, looki ferocious, his BLUE EYES BLAZING.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: You should not have come here tonight, Tom.

dialogues.speaker: VOLDEMORT
dialogues.text: It is you who made that mistake, Dumbledore!  182. He slashes with his wand.

dialogues.speaker: VOLDEMORT
dialogues.text: Avada Kedavra! Dumbledore VANISHES with a swirl of his cloak and reappea between Voldemort and Bellatrix. She tries to run, but Dumbledore knocks her to the ground with a stunning spell, vanishing again just as another KILLING CURSE strikes the wall and explodes, shaking the hall. He reappears close to Voldemort. Dumbledore raises his wa and strikes. A BLINDING LIGHT issues forth from it, the POWER of it staggering. Voldemort conjures a GLOWING, TRANSLUCENT SHI around himself. Dumbledore’s spell COLLIDES with it, fill the room completely with BLINDING LIGHT. The whole room shakes. Harry staggers to the ground. Bits of dust and rock fall the walls. The light fades and Voldemort is unharmed.

dialogues.speaker: VOLDEMORT
dialogues.text: You do not seek to kill me, Dumbledore?

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: There are other ways to destroy a man, Tom.

dialogues.speaker: VOLDEMORT
dialogues.text: There is nothing worse than death!

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: You are quite wrong, Tom, as you have always been. Voldemort fires another killing curse at Dumbledore. Fawk the Phoeniz swoops down from above and SWALLOWS the jet o green light, EXPLODING into flames and falling to the ear Dumbledore spins, sending a constant flow of BLINDING LIG BLASTING from his wand, the sheer POWER of it SHAKING the HALL. Voldemort raises his own wand, and the LIGHT separa around him. Dumbledore and Voldemort are SURROUNDED by th flow of LIGHT.  183. Dumbledore grits his teeth as a high wind BILLOWS his CLO around him. Voldemort glares at Dumbledore, EYES BLOOD-RE His wand trembles in his hand, and Voldemort is slowly be forced backward by the power of the STREAM of LIGHT. Fear flickers in Voldemort’s eyes. He lets out a ROAR of frustration. A ring of GREEN FLAME surrounds him, and he vanishes in a TONGUE of RED-ORANGE FIRE. Dumbledore’s stream of LIGHT BLASTS into the wall and PUN a HUGE, GAPING HOLE in the wall, shaking the whole Minist Harry is lifted bodily into the air and tossed into the w from the explosion. There is a sharp CRACK of rock BREAKING, and half of the ceiling falls in. Dumbledore whips around his wand and Ha is pulled from under the falling rocks. Voldemort reappears on the PILINTH where the statues had been.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Look out! He raised his wand, shouting a spell. The water in the po below the statues instantly flow upward to surround Volde in a globe of water. Voldemort vanishes from within the globe of water, and it crashes back down to the pool, spilling over onto the flo

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Professor! He stands up.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Stay where you are, Harry! Dumbledore sounds frightened. Then Harry SCREAMS. His scar simply SPLITS open and BLOOD SPIRTS from it. He shrieks in agony, the pain unbearable. Harry speaks, but it is not his voice.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY /VOLDEMORT
dialogues.text: Kill me now, Dumbledore...do it, if death means nothing...  184. Green flames explode from all of the fireplaces around th and people appear as they APPERATE. Cornelius Fudge arriv too. Voldemort shrieks in pain, and he appears across the room snatches up the unconscious body of Bellatrix and DISSAPARATES in a blast of GREEN FIRE. Harry slumps to the ground. His eyes are closed, his face peaceful. Blood flows from his scar across his face to th ground.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Harry! He runs to Harry’s side and touches his skin. He closes h eyes and whispers a spell. Harry’s eyes snap open.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Are you all right, Harry? Harry nods, dazed.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Minister, I saw him! You-Know-Who! He was right there! Fudge is standing in the middle of the room, a dazed look also on his face.

dialogues.speaker: FUDGE
dialogues.text: I know...I saw him too... Dumbledore stands. Half the room gasps and draws back. Fu seems to notice him for the first time.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: If you and your men will proceed to the Death Room, you will find several Death Eaters which I and some others have apprehended. Fudge points at Dumbledore.

dialogues.speaker: FUDGE
dialogues.text: Seize him! Dumbledore stands to his full height, his eyes BLAZING wi ANGER.  185.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Minister, you have just seen You- Know-Who in the flesh only seconds ago! It is time to come to your senses! Fudge looks cowed.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: If you insist on trying to arrest me, I am perfectly willing demonstrate how useless such an attempt will be. No one looks remotely interested in trying to arrest Dumbledore.

dialogues.speaker: FUDGE
dialogues.text: Dumbledore, what the blazes happened here? Dumbledore smiles, and walks back over to Harry, lifting to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: I will explain everything, Minister. Just as soon as I return Harry to school. Fudge (and half the crowd) turns to see Harry for the fir time.

dialogues.speaker: FUDGE
dialogues.text: What’s he doing here? And what’s happened to him? Dumbledore taps his wand against Harry’s scar and the bleeding stops. He turns to the Minister of Magic.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Minister, you will order the removal of Dolores Umbridge from my school. (pause) Also, she will probably need medical attention, having had a violent encounter with some Centaurs earlier this evening. (pause) (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DUMBLEDORE (cont'd) All Educational Decrees will be nullified and you will call off the search on Hagrid so he can return to work. Fudge is sputtering incomprehensibly.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: I will return here later tonight, after I have seen to Harry. It should not take long. He taps the Golden centaur head.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Portus. He motions Harry over.

dialogues.speaker: FUDGE
dialogues.text: Dumbledore, I want some answers!

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: The Second War has begun, Minister. Harry takes the head with Dumbledore, and they vanish fro the Ministry of Magic. INT. DUMBLEDORE’S OFFICE - NIGHT Harry and Dumbledore reappear in his office. There are sh of welcome from the portraits.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Thank you... He takes a small baby Phoenix from his pocket and places on Fawkes’ stand. Dumbledore’s desk has been repaired, and the Pensive rest upon it.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Please sit, Harry. Harry is staring at him, bitterness and sorrow evident on face.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: I understand how you feel, Harry--

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: No you don’t!  187. Dumbledore looks hard at him.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: You forget that Sirius was my friend too. You are not the only person on this earth capable of feelings, Harry. Harry nearly snarls at him.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: There is no shame in feeling pain, Harry. It is your greatest strength...

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: You don’t have a clue! You can’t possibly know!

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: What can’t I know? Harry grabs an instrument from one of the tables and thro it across the room.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: This pain is part of being human, Harry...

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: (screaming) Then I don’t want to be human! He kicks at a table, and the leg breaks, sending the whol thing crashing to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I don’t care! I don’t care! He begins to silently weep, tears pouring down his face. throws over another table and falls to his knees.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: You do care. You care so much you feel like you will bleed to death because of it. Harry gets to his feet. Harry turns and moves to the door. He yanks on the handle The door will not open. He looks at Dumbledore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me out.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: No. Harry draws his wand, looking furious.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: You can’t keep me in here!

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: I daresay I can. And if you actually do attack me with that wand, Harry, I'm afraid to say you will regret it. 188. Harry is silent, breathing hard and glaring at Dumbledore The Headmaster indicates the chair in front of his desk. Harry finally sits, looking sulky.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: It is my fault Sirius died tonight. (pause) I have kept things from you, Harry. Things that I should not have concealed. You had a right to know, but I put off telling you. Dumbledore sighs, sadly, and suddenly he seems very old.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Had I told you that Voldemort might try to lure you down to the Department of Mysteries you would never have gone there tonight. Sirius would never have gone after you. (pause) That fault lies with me. I hope that you can find it in your heart to forgive me one day. Harry stares angrily out the window.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Harry, I owe you this explanation, to show you the failings of an old man. Harry continues staring out the window.  189.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Our explanation begins with your scar. You already know that it is a connection between you and Voldemort, and that this connection goes both ways. (pause) I grew worried that Voldemort would at some point discover this connection, which he did the night Mr. Weasely was attacked.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I already know all this.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Haven’t you wondered why I haven’t spoken to you, even looked at you, for months?

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Well, yeah, I did...

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: I was worried that if Voldemort discovered there was a closer relationship between us than simply between teacher and student he would use you to spy on the Order. Another mistake. (pause) Voldemort showed us both tonight that his aim in possessing you would not be to destroy me, but to destroy you. Harry looks at his shoes.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Sirius told me you believed there was a snake inside of you. This was Voldemort attempting to manipulate you. To protect you from this, I had you study Occlumency.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: But Snape stopped giving me lessons.  190.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Yes. I thought he could overcome his feelings towards your father, but I was wrong. Some wounds cut too deep to be healed.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: He barely taught me, though. I always felt more open to it after the lessons. Like he was trying to open me to Voldemort--

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: I would trust Severus Snape with my life, Harry. You have never recovered from your mistrust of him in your first year.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Sirius didn’t trust him. Didn’t believe he’d really turned to our side...

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Again, some wounds run too deep to be healed, Harry. Severus and Sirius never liked each other at school. This has never changed. Harry glares at the carpet.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: During your Occulumency lessons, Professor Snape discovered that you were dreaming about the door in the Department of Mysteries.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I’ve been dreaming about that all year, before Voldemort discovered the connection.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Yes. Voldemort has been obsessed with hearing that prophesy since he returned. Because of your scar, what he was obsessed with, you were obsessed with, in the form of dreams. (pause) (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DUMBLEDORE (cont'd) Once he discovered the connection, Voldemort had little difficulty in Manipulating you into thinking he had captured Sirius.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: But I checked Grimmauld Place! Kreacher said--

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Kreacher lied. He wanted you to go to the Department of Mysteries.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Kreacher has been serving two masters for some months now.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: It appears that when Sirius told him to get out, Kreacher thought he meant out of the house. So he went to the Black’s closest relatives, the Malfoys. (pause) Obviously, they questioned him. Sirius had forbidden him from giving up important secrets. But Sirius had neglected to mention his relationship with you. (pause) He told them how you saw him as a mixture of father and brother, and that you would move heaven and earth to save Sirius. (pause) Voldemort knew that making you believe he had Sirius in the Department of Mysteries would force you there.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Wait, where was Sirius when I tried to contact him?

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Ah. Apparently Kreacher had injured Buckbeak to distract him in case you tried to contact Headquarters. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DUMBLEDORE (cont'd) Sirius was tending to the wounds when you called.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: And Hermione said we should be nice to Kreacher!

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: She was quite right, Harry. Kreacher is what wizards have made him. He is to be pitied, not hated.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Sirius hated him.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: He didn’t hate Kreacher himself. Kreacher was a reminder to Sirius of the home he had always hated.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Yeah, he really hated that place. And you kept him locked up in there!

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: I was trying to save his life! Dumbledore buries his head in his hands. Harry is dumbfounded. The Headmaster looks up finally.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: It is time to tell you what I should have five years ago. No doubt you have wondered why it was that I sent you there and not to a wizarding family? (pause) I did it for your protection. You were in more danger than anyone realized. Voldemort was defeated, but his servants were everywhere. Harry is silent.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: I also knew that Voldemort would return one day. I played to his weakness. There is an ancient magic which Voldemort has always underestimated. (pause) (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DUMBLEDORE (cont'd) This magic is what your mother gave you when she died. That protection would only work, however, if you were cared for by a blood relative. Your Aunt, Petunia.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: She never loved me.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Perhaps not. But she took you in, however grudgingly. As long as you can call your Aunt’s house your home, you are protected. Harry looks away.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: And now we come to the moment of terrible truth, the moment I have dreaded for fifteen years. The moment when I must lay another burden atop your already straining shoulders. Harry stares into his blue eyes.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Do you remember your first year here? When you lay in the hospital wing fresh from your confrontation with Voldemort? Harry nods.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Do you remember what you asked me that night?

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I asked you why Voldemort tried to kill me.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Yes. I decided not to tell you then. After all, eleven was too young for such burdens. The same went for twelve. But I was running out of excuses by thirteen and fourteen. Do you see the flaw in my plan yet? Harry shakes his head.  194.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: I cared about you too much. I became more concerned with your happiness and well-being than with the truth and the lives it could save. That was my greatest mistake. It was exactly what Voldemort expects from us fools who love. (pause) But I could not bear to tell you. I have watched you pass through greater trials than any other student in the history of this school, and I could not bear to add another one, the greatest one of all. He looks at Harry, sympathy and regret etched on his face

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: You have no idea the pain it causes me to tell it to you, even now. But unfortunately, I must.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I don’t understand, Professor. Dumbledore sighs again.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: The reason Voldemort tried to kill you is because of a prophesy made just before your birth. By attempting to kill you, he believed he was fulfilling the terms of the prophesy. Voldemort’s mistake was that he had not heard the entire prophesy. (pause) That is the weapon we have been guarding, and which he has been so desperately seeking: the knowledge of how to destroy you. Harry sighs this time. He looks at the floor.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Professor, why am I so important to him? Harry hangs his head.  195.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: An excellent question, Harry. The answer lies in the prophesy.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Sir, it got smashed.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: That was not the only place the Prophesy is preserved. Dumbledore raises his wand to his temple and extracts a memory, placing it in the pensive. He waves his wand over The ghostly image of Professor Trelawney rises from the b

dialogues.speaker: TRELAWNEY
dialogues.text: “The One with the power to vanquish the Dark Lord approaches....Born to those who have thrise defied him, born as the Seventh Month dies...and the Dark Lord will mark him as his equal, but he will have a power the Dark Lord knows not...and either must die at the hand of the other for neither can live while the other survives....The One with the power to vanquish the Dark Lord will be born as the Seventh Month dies...” The image of Trelawney fades. Harry looks staggered.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I’m not sure I understand all that, sir...

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: It means that the only person with a chance of defeating Voldemort was born at the end of July to parents who had resisted him three times before.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: And...it means me?  196.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Interestingly, there were two boys whom the prophesy could have been referring to. You and Neville Longbottom.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: So it’s not necessarily me, sir?

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: You forget the next qualification of the prophesy. The Dark Lord will mark this boy as his equal. (pause) In giving you that scar, Voldemort did so. I’m afraid that the prophesy is most certainly referring to you.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: What if he chose wrong?

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: He chose the child he believed to be the more dangerous. He chose the “half-blood” wizard because he saw some of himself in you. (pause) He tried to kill you and instead gave you the power and the future to destroy him.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Why didn’t he wait? Why attack when we were babies?

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Voldemort had an informant listening to my meeting with Professor Trelawney. Fortunately he was discovered before he could hear the entire prophesy. Voldemort had to act immediately, he didn’t know the rest of the prophesy. All he knew was that he had to destroy the child who would grow to be a threat to his power.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: But I don’t have any special powers. Dumbledore is silent for a moment.  197.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: There is a room in the Department of Mysteries which is kept locked at all times. It contains a force so wonderful and yet terrible that it is greater than death itself. It is that power which you have incredible amounts of and of which Voldemort has none.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: What is it, sir?

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: This power drove you to save Sirius tonight. It kept Voldemort from possessing you, he cannot bear to touch it. (pause) In the end, it was your heart and not your head that saved you. Harry looks away.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: There is only the end of the prophesy which we haven't addressed. It states “neither can live while the other survives.” Harry slowly looks up at Dumbledore.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: It is the final burden which I must place on you, Harry.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: One of us has to kill the other...in the end. Dumbledore nods, and there are tears misting his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: DUMBLEDORE
dialogues.text: Yes. They sit quietly together. Dumbledore softly wipes a tear from his cheek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry sits by himself on a boulder by the side of the lak He watches the sunset.  198.

dialogues.speaker: NEARLY-HEADLESS NICK
dialogues.text: Hello, Harry. Harry turns to see NEARLY-HEADLESS NICK, a GHOST, standin beside him.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Hey, Nick. Nick looks uncomfortable.

dialogues.speaker: NEARLY-HEADLESS NICK
dialogues.text: I--Well, Madam Pomfrey asked me to tell you that Hermione and Ron are out of the hospital wing.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Oh. Thanks. He stands and they begin to walk back to the castle toget

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Nick, I was wondering about something? Nick looks even more uncomfortable now.

dialogues.speaker: NEARLY-HEADLESS NICK
dialogues.text: I’ve been expecting this...

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Expecting what?

dialogues.speaker: NEARLY-HEADLESS NICK
dialogues.text: A lot of people come to me when they’ve lost loved ones.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I expect so... There is a silence.

dialogues.speaker: NEARLY-HEADLESS NICK
dialogues.text: He’s not coming back, Harry. There is another silence.

dialogues.speaker: NEARLY-HEADLESS NICK
dialogues.text: Few wizards choose the path I have chosen.

dialogues.speaker: NEARLY-HEADLESS NICK
dialogues.text: I am neither here nor there, Harry. Trapped between two worlds. That does not appeal to most. (pause) I know nothing of the secrets of death, Harry. I was afraid of it. I preferred to survive as a feeble imitation of life than face the vast unknown. (pause) I often wonder if that was a wise decision. They approach the great doors leading to the entry hall. Nick looks at Harry.

dialogues.speaker: NEARLY-HEADLESS NICK
dialogues.text: I’m sorry I couldn’t be of more help, Harry. Truly I am. Nick vanishes through the wall into the castle. Harry ste through the doors into the entry hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry enters.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Harry! He turns to see Hermione and Ron racing down the steps towards him. Hermione throws herself into Harry’s arms in a huge bear

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: How are you?

dialogues.speaker: RON
dialogues.text: Good as new, mate. Hermione pulls herself away from Harry and looks at him closely.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: (quietly) How are you doing, Harry? Harry pauses for a long moment, thinking.  200.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Better.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Come on, let’s go in to the feast. Harry shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: You two go on. I want to be alone for a while. Hermione nods. They turn away and begin to walk into the great hall.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I’ve got something to tell you. Something important. They stop and look at him again.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: But not right now. I’m not ready.

dialogues.speaker: HERMIONE
dialogues.text: Take your time, Harry. We'll be here when you are. She smiles at him. Ron and Hermione disappear into the gr hall. Luna comes down the stairs carrying a stack of papers. Sh goes up to the NOTICE BOARD and attaches one of the paper it. She turns and sees Harry.

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: Hello, Harry. He walks up to her.

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: It’s the last night and I need to pack.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Then why are you putting up signs?

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: Oh, people take my things and hide them. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LUNA (cont'd) I don’t think they like me much. Some of them call me “Loony” Lovegood. Harry looks at her in pity.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Do you need any help looking?

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: Oh no. It all turns up in the end. She looks at him serenely.

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: Sirius Black. Hermione said he was your Godfather.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Yeah. (pause) Have you ever...you know...

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: My mother. I was nine.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I’m sorry.

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: It’s okay. It’s not like I’1l never see her again.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Isn’t it?

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: Don’t tell me you didn’t hear them. The voices beyond the Veil? Harry looks startled.

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: They were just out of sight, that’s all.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: You mean we'll see them again?

dialogues.speaker: LUNA
dialogues.text: Of course. (pause) Things always work out, in the end. 201.  202. She smiles at him. Then she heads back up the stairs and the feast. Harry is left alone in the entry hall. He turns and looks into the glorious sunset. For the first time in a long time, Harry smiles too.
